verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Your body high on Calvary Holds Your head for all to see Behold God’s deepest mystery The love He gave His all for me{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Hearts too weak to come for comfort Mountains high we cannot climb Often times we must be carried Only He our wounds can bind;{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Your body lifts Your head up high Sinners only need to gaze Death in You but life in us If only we can see Your face.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: {lang-eng}You bore the pain endured it for us Willingly gave up Your life Crown of thorns in stead of glory Tasting death You paid the price;{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v5
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Your body’s side was pierced for us From it see the streams of life Blood and water flowing free Together they prepare Your wife.{/lang-eng}
